two...
one.

-What? -Round trip to Maui,
translation.de: Was? Maui hin und zurück, 55 Dollar.

translation.en: Two hundred dollars to Shanghai?
Ibiza? [exaggerated French accent] Paris?
-[Paula] Uh, that's amazing. -Do we love?
[exaggerated] It's amazing.
Yeah. So, okay, wait, wait, wait.
What does the fine print say?
-"Some restrictions apply." Okay. -Okay.
"Posted fees include tax and do not include additional bag charges.
Also, you may have to kiss your dad for six whole minutes?
Blackout dates apply.
You and your best friend have to get matching haircuts.
Extended leg room offered at an additional charge.
You can only bring one carry-on bag and it must be a hamster.
translation.de: Nur ein Handgepäck erlaubt, und es muss ein Hamster sein.

translation.en: No food is allowed on the flight unless you bring enough for everyone.
translation.de: Mitgebrachte Lebensmittel müssen für alle reichen.

translation.en: Anyone who says the word "me" or "I" or "plane"
will be doused in soup."
-Uh-- -I'm thinking... -no. -Let's go for it. -[plane hums] -Obviously.
translation.de: -Ich denke, nein... -Auf jeden Fall. Ist doch klar.

translation.en: -[intercom chimes] -[woman] Thank you and we do hope you have a good flight.
translation.de: Wir wünschen Ihnen einen guten Flug.

translation.en: -I'm so glad we did this. -Aw.
-[French accent] Paris, baby. -[giggles]
[sighs] I'm glad we're almost halfway there. I'm just gonna, like, grab a little shuteye.
translation.de: Ich bin froh, dass wir bald da sind. Ich werde etwas schlafen.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. Do you, babe. -Yeah, baby. Okay.
[jovial, thin voice] Hello!
And welcome!
I'm Cashew Albacore,
CEO and inventor of Air Cashew,
translation.de: Geschäftsführer und Erfinder von Air Cashew,

translation.en: the world's first airline owned by just me.
translation.de: der ersten Fluggesellschaft, die nur mir gehört.

translation.en: I hope you love adventure because it's time to flew.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, ihr mögt Abenteuer, denn es ist Zeit zu fliegen.

translation.en: -After 30 years... -[mouths] What? ...in the rat and mustard business,
translation.de: Nach 30 Jahren in der Rettich- und Senfbranche

translation.en: I saved up enough money to buy my own airline.
translation.de: habe ich genug Geld für meine eigene Airline verdient.

translation.en: -Me even designed the uniforms. -[curtains rustle]
translation.de: Ich habe sogar die Uniformen entworfen.

translation.en: Beverage? We have hot soda and warm hair.
translation.de: Getränke? Wir haben heiße Limo und warme Haare.

translation.en: -No, thank you. -Ew.
We're committed to staying in the air once we've taken off.
translation.de: Wir bemühen uns, nach dem Start in der Luft zu bleiben.

translation.en: -[trumpets blow] -And now, it's Pine Cone Time!
[Cashew] Our air is different -[air vents hiss] -from other airlines,
translation.de: Unsere Luft ist anders als bei anderen Airlines,

translation.en: [sing-songy] but I won't tell you how.
-[both] We're gonna die! -[Cashew] Gonna die. Your words, not mine.
translation.de: -Wir werden sterben! -Wir werden sterben! Das sind eure Worte.

translation.en: I prefer words like
truffle pig, hot scrod, goose dust,
-We're gonna die. -and the Spanish word for dream, sueño.
translation.de: und das spanische Wort für Traum, sueño.

translation.en: It took a big, hot sueño to sew this plane together.
translation.de: Es brauchte einen heißen sueño, um dieses Flugzeug zu nähen.

translation.en: -Sew? -[Cashew] So,
all our planes are homemade and FDA-certified, nom nom.
translation.de: Unsere Flugzeuge sind selbstgemacht und von der FDA zertifiziert, nom-nom.

translation.en: I tried to buy my own sports team,
translation.de: Ich wollte mein eigenes Sportteam kaufen,

translation.en: but no one wanted to be called the Denver Doodles of Nashville.
translation.de: aber keiner wollte Denver Dooders aus Nashville heißen.

translation.en: [playfully] So I turned my sights to the skies.
translation.de: Also richtete ich meinen Blick gen Himmel.

translation.en: I can't believe this is happening.
-[alarm beeps] -Did you say "I"?
-[curtains rustle] -Danni, -in 3C. -[soup splats]
[Cashew] Better not complain, or we'll have to wake up the pilot.
translation.de: Lieber nicht beschweren, sonst müssen wir den Piloten wecken.

translation.en: -[trumpets blow] -Just kidding! It's me,
and welcome to Cashew Air,
the only airline where you can earn...
translation.de: der einzigen Airline, bei der man Punkte verdienen kann.

translation.en: So, fasten your meatbelts, -[intercom chimes] -and go to sleep,
translation.de: Also, legt die Speckgürtel an und legt euch schlafen.

translation.en: -[item thuds] -because you're on Cashew Air.
translation.de: Denn ihr reist mit Cashew Air.

translation.en: -Something is wrong with me. -[intercom chimes]
